name: SUBY

Accept USDC, USDT, ETH, SOL & BNB across multiple chains and monetize your group with customizable subscription plans, flexible pricing, billing cycles, free trials, and discounts. Manage members, track revenue, and reduce churn with our centralized dashboard, the all-in-one solution for secure, low-fee crypto recurring payments in high-value communities.
